body:
nobody does care. the mass public STILL thinks trump colluded, they still think trump is lying about biden and obama's ties to the chinese, they still think hillary's emails and soldiers killed in benghazi is a non issue

no one gives a fuck, nothing will happen to these criminals, no matter what comes out

post.title: [Jim Jordan] The Obama/Biden Administration knew it was hoax. They knew the Trump Campaign didn’t collude with Russia. They knew they were wasting taxpayer money. But they didn’t care.

body:
I lived through ancient times when Watergate was in the news. Nobody cared about Watergate, except mainstream news. The news cared deeply, because the Democrat lost the election. News media humped the Watergate story for a year and nobody cared about it. Then mainstream media went wall-to-wall 24/7 and, after another year, people pretended to care.

Caring is a manufactured thing, and mainstream media isn't interesting in making anyone care about the fact that Obama bin Biden on a day were 10,000 times worse than Nixon on a bad day.
body_html:
I lived through ancient times when Watergate was in the news. Nobody cared about Watergate, except mainstream news. The news cared deeply, because the Democrat lost the election. News media humped the Watergate story for a year and nobody cared about it. Then mainstream media went wall-to-wall 24/7 and, after another year, people pretended to care.

Caring is a manufactured thing, and mainstream media isn't interesting in making anyone care about the fact that Obama bin Biden on a day were 10,000 times worse than Nixon on a bad day.

post.title: [Jim Jordan] The Obama/Biden Administration knew it was hoax. They knew the Trump Campaign didn’t collude with Russia. They knew they were wasting taxpayer money. But they didn’t care.

body:
Nixon won the election in a landslide. Nixon busy getting Americans out of the Vietnam War, and mostly that was all people cared about. Nixon was big on law and order, and we were going through a spasm of BLM ultra violence.

Then Nixon was accused by partisan mainstream media of hiring somebody who hired somebody to get a gang of Cuban exiles to spy on the Democrats. Everyone who was anyone agree, that was typical of the tactics of American politics, that it was common practice, that the Democrats had done similar things a time or three before. That it was no really a big deal.

Every news station and major news paper then turned it into the Russian Collusion Delusion of its day, and in its day there was no Internet. Not balance. No 'other side.' It was pure shitstorm all day, everyday.
body_html:
Nixon won the election in a landslide. Nixon busy getting Americans out of the Vietnam War, and mostly that was all people cared about. Nixon was big on law and order, and we were going through a spasm of BLM ultra violence.

Then Nixon was accused by partisan mainstream media of hiring somebody who hired somebody to get a gang of Cuban exiles to spy on the Democrats. Everyone who was anyone agree, that was typical of the tactics of American politics, that it was common practice, that the Democrats had done similar things a time or three before. That it was no really a big deal.

Every news station and major news paper then turned it into the Russian Collusion Delusion of its day, and in its day there was no Internet. Not balance. No 'other side.' It was pure shitstorm all day, everyday.
